subject: Boxing
Sporting Goods and Equipment
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The boxing ring, even for the richest fight, is a simple thing: an assembly of plywood, canvas and other parts that is not afforded the deep respect given other sporting surfaces.
snippet: The boxing ring, even for the richest fight, is a simple thing: an assembly of plywood, canvas and other parts that is not afforded the deep respect given other sporting surfaces.
